content: I'm not entirely sure where to ask this but should #31306 be closed? A lot has changed since 2016 and I'm pretty sure it's no longer relevant. At least I've not seen anything like it.
Looks like the tests in the OP still have a // ignore-msvc comment. That would be a good place to start to know if this is fixed.

@Chris Denton The ignore-msvc lines need to be removed before it can be closed.

It is not clear to me if those errors always happened, or if they were intermittent due to a dirty build directory. I'm having a hard time imagining how the crate locator would pick up libarena as a candidate for the a crate.

I might suggest just opening a PR to remove the ignore-msvc lines, and see if anyone encounters the errors again.
(I quickly tested with msvc, and the tests pass for me.)
Thanks to you both! I've created a PR (#91411) as suggested.
